text: @beausteph53 @Femi_Sorry @BorisJohnson Yes mine is similar. Weird sounding cough but mostly just feeling short of breath. Its absolutely not a ‘persistent’ cough, just helps relieve the breathing. I feel like I have a sinus infection. Could be covid says the GP so cant prescribe anything, and so i go on suffering it.
